name: Retention Squad
description:
Retention Squad is a solo developed indie multiplayer battle royale game. Check the trailer once you would know what is the power of the game. It can be played only through multiplayer mode. You can invite your friends , create and join rooms and enjoy the battle royale experience.

Why Retention Squad ?

* It has very engaging small play area increasing the engagement of the gameplay         

* This game is an outlawed game for the conventional game mechanics. The game is filled with unconventional game mechanics like the player can pass through the walls and obstacles which can increase the stealth of the player, strange medikit behaviour also you have zone surveillance to spot the players and the medikit available area.

 * These cool unconventional game mechanics can collectively give the gamers an engaging and seat edge gaming experience.        

 * It is a multiplayer game which a beginner can even play 

Follow our profile to experience the next gen gaming 

beatfiregames.itch.io

You can also support by sharing them to friends
